name: Youtube 1080p player for 2560x1440 monitors
description: Have a 1440p monitor but want to watch 1080p videos on youtube in their native resolution? No downscaling to 720p or going fullscreen and upscale to 1440p here! This style gives the youtube player a comfortable 1920x1080 resolution.
additional_info:
changelog:
18/07/2014 - 1.2.1
Again, fixed theater-background height not changing properly. But it wasn't my fault this time!

17/07/2014 - v1.2
Fixed theater-background height not changing properly.

30/06/2014 - v1.1
Margin will no longer interfere with medium player.

28/06/1014 - v1.0
Initial release.
